first_para: Colonel Robert Alexander "Bob" Stewart, DSO (born 7 July 1949) is a former British Army officer, former United Nations commander in Bosnia, commentator, author, public speaker and Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Beckenham constituency in South-East London since the 2010 general election.

full.extract:
Colonel Robert Alexander "Bob" Stewart, DSO (born 7 July 1949) is a former British Army officer, former United Nations commander in Bosnia, commentator, author, public speaker and Conservative Party politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Beckenham constituency in South-East London since the 2010 general election.
^ "Bob Stewart MP". BBC Democracy Live (BBC). Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ Waller, Martin (20 July 2009). "Can Colonel Bob conquer books on business?". The Times (London). Retrieved 8 August 2009. 
^ "Bob Stewart". Now You're Talking. Retrieved 8 August 2009.
full.title: Bob Stewart (British Army officer)
